trans-unit.source: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.
trans-unit.target: 代表一組允許或拒絕使用者或群組的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The RegistryAccessRule class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on registry keys.
trans-unit.target: RegistryAccessRule 類別是一組.NET Framework 提供用於管理 Windows 存取控制安全性登錄機碼的類別。

trans-unit.source: For an overview of these classes, and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這些類別和其基礎的 Windows 存取控制結構的關聯性的概觀，請參閱<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Windows 存取控制安全性只能套用到登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key.
trans-unit.target: 它無法套用至個別的索引鍵/值組儲存在索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: To get a list of the rules currently applied to a registry key, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object, and then use its <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAccessRules%2A> method to obtain a collection of RegistryAccessRule objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前套用的登錄機碼的規則清單，請使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來取得<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>物件，然後再使用其<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAccessRules%2A>方法，以取得 RegistryAccessRule 物件的集合。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAccessRules%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: RegistryAccessRule objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary control access list (DACL).
trans-unit.target: RegistryAccessRule 物件不會對應一對一與基礎判別控制存取清單 (DACL) 中的存取控制項目。

trans-unit.source: When you get the set of all access rules for a registry key, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries.
trans-unit.target: 取得登錄機碼中的所有存取規則的集合，集合會包含目前表示所有存取控制項目所需的規則的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 基礎的存取控制項目變更為您套用和移除規則。

trans-unit.source: The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries.
trans-unit.target: 規則中的資訊可能的話，合併到維護最小的數字的存取控制項目。

trans-unit.source: Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當讀取目前的規則清單時，它看起來可能不完全與您加入的所有規則的清單。

trans-unit.source: Use RegistryAccessRule objects to specify access rights to allow or deny to a user or group.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RegistryAccessRule 物件來指定要允許或拒絕使用者或群組的存取權限。

trans-unit.source: A RegistryAccessRule object always represents either allowed access or denied access, never both.
trans-unit.target: 物件一律代表 RegistryAccessRule 允許存取或拒絕存取，永遠不會兩者。

trans-unit.source: To apply a rule to a registry key, use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要將規則套用到登錄機碼，使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來取得<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Modify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to reattach the security object.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>物件使用其方法來新增規則，然後使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>重新附加安全性物件的方法。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Changes you make to a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to assign the altered security object to the registry key.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 作<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>物件不會影響登錄機碼的存取層級直到您呼叫<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>將登錄機碼變更後的安全性物件的方法。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>

trans-unit.source: RegistryAccessRule objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: RegistryAccessRule 物件是不可變的。

trans-unit.source: Security for a registry key is modified using the methods of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity> class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified.
trans-unit.target: 登錄機碼的安全性會使用的方法進行修改<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>類別來新增或移除規則; 當您這麼做時，會修改基礎的存取控制項目。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref> class, specifying the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref>類別，指定使用者或群組將規則套用到的存取權限，以及是否允許或拒絕指定的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This constructor specifies default propagation and inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式指定預設傳播和繼承。

trans-unit.source: That is, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 使用者或群組要套用規則。

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> or a type such as <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> that can be converted to type <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 必須是型別<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>或型別，例如<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>可以轉換為類型<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref> values indicating the rights allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref>值，指出權限允許或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values indicating whether the rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指出是否允許或拒絕權限。

trans-unit.source: registryRights specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: registryRights指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- type specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-type指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- eventRights is zero.
trans-unit.target: -或-eventRights為零。

trans-unit.source: identity is neither of type nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .
trans-unit.target: identity既不是類型或型別，例如可以轉換為類型 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref> class, specifying the name of the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref>類別指定名稱的使用者或群組將規則套用到的存取權限，以及是否允許或拒絕指定的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This constructor specifies default propagation and inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式指定預設傳播和繼承。

trans-unit.source: That is, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to creating an <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> object, by passing `identity` to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor, and passing the newly created <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> object to the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.%23ctor%28System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式相當於建立<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>物件，藉由傳遞`identity`至<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>建構函式，並傳遞新建<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>物件<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.%23ctor%28System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType%29>建構函式。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.%23ctor%28System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights%2CSystem.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType%29> </xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> </xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>

trans-unit.source: The name of the user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 將規則套用到使用者或群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref> values indicating the rights allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref>值，指出權限允許或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values indicating whether the rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指出是否允許或拒絕權限。

trans-unit.source: registryRights specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: registryRights指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- type specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-type指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: registryRights is zero.
trans-unit.target: registryRights為零。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- identity is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: -或-identity為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: -or- identity is longer than 512 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或-identity長度超過 512 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref> class, specifying the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, the inheritance flags, the propagation flags, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref>類別、 使用者或群組規則適用於存取權限的繼承旗標，指定傳播旗標，並指定的存取權限是否允許或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: The user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 使用者或群組要套用規則。

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> or a type such as <xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref> that can be converted to type <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 必須是型別<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>或型別，例如<xref href="System.Security.Principal.NTAccount"></xref>可以轉換為類型<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref> values specifying the rights allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref>指定權限的值允許或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> flags specifying how access rights are inherited from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>旗標，指定如何將存取權限繼承自其他物件。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> flags specifying how access rights are propagated to other objects.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref>旗標指定的存取權限傳播到其他物件的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values specifying whether the rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指定是否允許或拒絕權限。

trans-unit.source: registryRights specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: registryRights指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- type specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-type指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- inheritanceFlags specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-inheritanceFlags指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- propagationFlags specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-propagationFlags指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- registryRights is zero.
trans-unit.target: -或-registryRights為零。

trans-unit.source: identity is neither of type , nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .
trans-unit.target: identity既不是類型 ，或這類類型的可以轉換為類型 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref> class, specifying the name of the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, the inheritance flags, the propagation flags, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule"></xref>類別指定名稱的使用者或群組規則適用於存取權限的繼承旗標，傳播旗標，且是否允許或拒絕指定的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 將規則套用到使用者或群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref> values indicating the rights allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref>值，指出權限允許或拒絕。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> flags specifying how access rights are inherited from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>旗標，指定如何將存取權限繼承自其他物件。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> flags specifying how access rights are propagated to other objects.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref>旗標指定的存取權限傳播到其他物件的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values specifying whether the rights are allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指定是否允許或拒絕權限。

trans-unit.source: registryRights specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: registryRights指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- type specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-type指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- inheritanceFlags specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-inheritanceFlags指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: -or- propagationFlags specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -或-propagationFlags指定無效的值。

trans-unit.source: eventRights is zero.
trans-unit.target: eventRights為零。

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- identity is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: -或-identity為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: -or- identity is longer than 512 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或-identity長度超過 512 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 取得所存取規則允許或拒絕的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule> objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule>物件是不可變的。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: You can create a new access rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>, but you cannot modify an existing access rule.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立新的存取規則，代表不同的使用者、 不同的權限，或不同<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>，但是您不能修改現有的存取規則。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref> values indicating the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights"></xref>值，指出權限所允許或拒絕存取規則。
